item.title: ATS Buddy: Privacy-First Resume AI
item.description: ATS Buddy is an AI-powered resume analysis tool built with AWS Bedrock, Textract, and Comprehend. Designed with a privacy-first approach, it redacts PII before analysis, helping job seekers optimize resumes without exposing personal data. With S3, DynamoDB caching, and serverless workflows, ATS Buddy delivers secure, cost-efficient resume insightsâ€”built hackathon-ready.
